decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty using cards like Entomb and Reanimate. By using efficient spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo, the deck aims to cheat out big threats early in the game and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Murktide Regent and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional value and flexibility to adapt to different situations. The deck also has disruption tools like Daze and Wasteland to control the opponent's game plan.

This combo deck utilizes Mystic Forge and various artifacts to generate a powerful card advantage and mana engine. By assembling the right pieces, the deck can ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with a combination of powerful creatures and spells. The key to success lies in efficiently utilizing mana sources like Urza's Saga and Grim Monolith, while also utilizing cards like Tezzeret, the Great Creator and The One Ring to threaten opponents with a wide range of threats and disruptions.

This BUG Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage and control of the board. With a mix of interaction spells like Force of Will, Fatal Push, and Stifle, along with powerful threats like Uro and Murktide Regent, this deck aims to slow down the opponent's strategy and outvalue them in the late game. The deck also utilizes cards like Brainstorm and Cling to Dust to filter draws and disrupt the opponent's graveyard strategies. Finally, the mana base includes a mix of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana development.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively disrupt the opponent's hand and board while utilizing efficient threats to deal damage swiftly. By combining hand disruption like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy with powerful creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Nethergoyf, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game. The inclusion of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Molten Collapse also provides reach and helps close out games. Overall, this deck focuses on proactive aggression and disruption to overwhelm opponents in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a mix of tempo control cards. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Dragon's Rage Channeler. The deck also utilizes Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student for card advantage and selection, along with Counterbalance to control the opponent's spells. The mana base includes a mix of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to the right colors of mana.

This deck focuses on assembling the Dark Depths combo to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token quickly and efficiently. It utilizes cards like Crop Rotation, Elvish Reclaimer, and Sylvan Library to find and protect the Dark Depths land. Mox Diamond and Green Sun's Zenith help accelerate the deck's game plan, while cards like Swords to Plowshares and Endurance provide disruption and protection. The inclusion of utility lands like Bojuka Bog and Maze of Ith adds versatility and resilience to the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly getting key creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It also includes disruption spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces. The deck aims to assemble the combo as quickly as possible to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and control spells. It also includes some versatile creatures like Brazen Borrower and Dauthi Voidwalker to provide additional utility and threats.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then using spells like Thoughtseize and Daze to disrupt the opponent's plan while setting up a game-winning combo. The key strategy is to efficiently reanimate powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to provide card advantage and additional utility to further enhance the deck's combo potential.

The focus of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to rapidly deploy powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt opponent's strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void. By utilizing mana acceleration with cards like Lotus Petal and Eldrazi Temple, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher, while also utilizing aggressive creatures like Glaring Fleshraker and Eldrazi Linebreaker. The deck also includes removal options like Kozilek's Command to handle opposing threats, creating a fast and disruptive game plan in the Legacy format.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with fast and aggressive Eldrazi creatures, backed up by powerful support cards like Chalice of the Void and Reality Smasher. By utilizing cards like Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb to ramp up your mana quickly, you can deploy your threats early and put pressure on your opponent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thought-Knot Seer and Wasteland to disrupt your opponent's strategy and keep them on the back foot. Overall, the goal is to establish a dominant board presence and close out the game quickly.

The main concept of this Aggro-Maverick Legacy deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy while quickly deploying threats on the board. By using cards like Assassin's Trophy, Chalice of the Void, and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck aims to control the game's pace and prevent the opponent from executing their game plan smoothly. Using efficient mana acceleration with Mox Diamond and disruptive lands like Wasteland, the deck can quickly get ahead and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Barrowgoyf and Scythecat Cub. The inclusion of cards like Shadowspear and Lavaspur Boots also enhances the deck's ability to close out games swiftly.

The deck revolves around disrupting the opponent's game plan through hand disruption like Thoughtseize and Smallpox, while generating value through the graveyard with Life from the Loam. Cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis provide threats that can quickly close out the game. The deck also utilizes land destruction with Wasteland and Ghost Quarter to control the opponent's mana base. By combining control elements with graveyard recursion and disruptive creatures, this deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent in a resource denial strategy.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with a mix of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and removal spells like Fatal Push. It also utilizes counterspells like Force of Will to control the board and protect its key cards. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student allows the player to draw cards and generate card advantage, while Thundertrap Trainer provides additional removal and control options. The mana base is carefully optimized to support the deck's need for multiple colors of mana while also including utility lands like Wasteland and Mystic Sanctuary.

The main concept of this deck is to lock down the opponent's mana base by playing cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also putting pressure on them with fast, aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Fury. The One Ring and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional ways to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Sundering Eruption and Karn, the Great Creator offer versatile removal options. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful early plays and disruptive effects.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back into play for a devastating combo. The deck includes cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces, while also utilizing cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm for card advantage and selection. Additionally, disruptive cards like Daze and Wasteland help to control the opponent's resources. Overall, the deck aims to win through graveyard shenanigans and overwhelming power on the board.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly and efficiently cast a high number of spells in order to combo off and win the game. By utilizing cards such as Pact of Negation, Simian Spirit Guide, and fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual, the deck aims to quickly mill the opponent's entire library with Balustrade Spy or Goblin Charbelcher, then win the game with either Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. This all-in strategy requires careful planning and execution to succeed in Legacy 1 vs 1 games.
